pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo tiroraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ caranti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:7.1: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:7.3: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo tiroraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ carissantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:7.4: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo tiroraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ carantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:7.7: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo tiroraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ carissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:7.8: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:7.9: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:8.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī tiroraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ careyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:9.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:10.2: yassa vijite viharati, taṃ ṭhapetvā aññassa raṭṭhe.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:11.2: tasmiṃ magge corānaṃ niviṭṭhokāso dissati, bhuttokāso dissati, ṭhitokāso dissati, nisinnokāso dissati, nipannokāso dissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:12.2: tasmiṃ magge corehi manussā hatā dissanti, viluttā dissanti, ākoṭitā dissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:14.2: kukkuṭasampāte gāme gāmantare gāmantare, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:14.3: Agāmake araññe addhayojane addhayojane āpatti pācittiyassa.
